main event: Witness observed an unidentified aerial phenomenon in Columbus, Ohio on 15 November 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes and 30 seconds,The object was reddish-orange and pulsating brightly,The object was observed shortly after 7 PM on a bright night,No photograph was included in the report,The witness was driving at about 65-70 miles per hour when they saw the object.
witness description: male, age redacted, reported the sighting to U.S. Air Force
